data.text: Now speaking: President of #UNGA John Ashe from Antigua and Barbuda. Follow him here: @UN_PGA. http://t.co/iQGKNs3nHC
Ban Ki-moon to #UNGA: "Let us empower the United Nations to be more than a first responder or a last resort." http://t.co/iQGKNs3nHC
Ban Ki-moon: "Let us get our priorities right & invest in people instead of wasting billions of $ on deadly weapons." http://t.co/iQGKNs3nHC
Behind-the-scenes: President of Brazil @DilmaBR is getting ready to address the #UNGA while Ban Ki-moon speaks. http://t.co/TINg7DahXo
Ban Ki-moon to #UNGA on Syria: "Military victory is an illusion. The only answer is a political settlement." http://t.co/iQGKNs3nHC
Ban Ki-moon: "we can hardly be satisfied w/ destroying chemical weapons while wider war is still destroying Syria." http://t.co/iQGKNs3nHC
Ban Ki-moon now addressing #SyriaCrisis at #UNGA: "A lost generation of young people now fills refugee camps" http://t.co/iQGKNs3nHC #Syria
Ban Ki-moon to #UNGA: "The empowerment & rights of women must be at the heart of everything we do." http://t.co/iQGKNs3nHC
Ban Ki-moon to #UNGA: "Inequality is growing. Too many people face exploitation – from fields to factory floor." http://t.co/iQGKNs3nHC
Ban Ki-moon to #UNGA: "Ours is the first generation that can wipe poverty from the face of the earth." http://t.co/iQGKNs3nHC #MDGs
Ban Ki-moon to #UNGA: "we come together – not to preserve the status quo, but to drive our world forward." http://t.co/iQGKNs3nHC
Live from UNHQ in NYC: watch world leaders speak at #UNGA here: http://t.co/Ri5AzB02ON. List of speakers & more: http://t.co/iQGKNs3nHC
Photo: Ban Ki-moon & Protocol Chief Yoon Yeocheol ahead of today's #UNGA meetings. Info here: http://t.co/iQGKNs3nHC http://t.co/M9avp9DwEm
#UNGA week continues on Tuesday so expect delays near UNHQ in NYC. See what's on the agenda here: http://t.co/Hq9iHumcFK
Looking for updates about Ban Ki-moon's meetings with world leaders? Follow @UN_Spokesperson for photos & more: http://t.co/8hgEO9MF7g
We've posted highlights from Monday's #UNGA on our blog. See photos, video & more here: http://t.co/aJrPBzpvZy #MDGsuccess
Concludes this week in Geneva: Human Rights Council. Details: http://t.co/G9Mf5Kdvmw. For updates, follow #HRC24 & @UN_HRC
A new report out this week says the #Syriacrisis is endangering development across the Arab world. Details here: http://t.co/xXYZLB3pa3
Ban Ki-moon: #UNGA is time to address most pressing problems - this year, none is more urgent than crisis in Syria http://t.co/ZxEM2c6Ony
What's on the agenda for #UNGA on Tuesday? We've outlined it all here on our blog: http://t.co/Hq9iHumcFK
What happened at #UNGA on Monday? Behind-the-scenes images are here: http://t.co/rsjFenxtzI. More info here: http://t.co/aJrPBzpvZy
Watch now: @UNPeacekeeping is taking part in #SocialGoodSummit at the "Making Peace with Technology" panel http://t.co/lmM4gJefSg  #2030Now
Now taking the floor at the #MDGSuccess event: #MDGs advocate @BillGates. Watch live here: http://t.co/13sSLjsGKG
Speaking now about connectivity at the #MDGSuccess event: @SherylSandberg. Watch here: http://t.co/lzfgN06tbm http://t.co/jEqRefnhqm
Urgent action needed to reach and protect children trapped by Syria conflict. Latest from @UNICEF http://t.co/czfTwmkqNR
Now at #SocialGoodSummit: JJ Abrams & UN's Peter Launsky-Tieffenthal discuss #socialgood & entertainment http://t.co/B50hhaHPPF #2030NOW
Now: @UNRightswire event on "delivering as one in enabling a disability-inclusive development agenda" http://t.co/biUiOv0Q2D #Rights2015
Winner of  UN Slavery Memorial design competition to be announced  on Monday. Meet the judges in this video: http://t.co/xNjyhZW2sJ
Watch now: Messenger of Peace Stevie Wonder press conf re: mtg on disabilities & development: http://t.co/AhtvK6J78R #HLMDD #thisability
Starting now: Watch Ban Ki-moon @BillGates @sherylsandberg & more @UN event on how to achieve #MDGSuccess. Webcast: http://t.co/AhtvK6J78R
"You can be part of what’s happening at UNHQ" -- Ban Ki-moon's 1st-ever post on @LinkedIn previews #UNGA week: http://t.co/ZxEM2c6Ony
Mon in NYC: High-level mtg on disabilities & development. See @UN_ENABLE @WHO #HLMDD & #thisability for updates http://t.co/aprool6Urr #UNGA
It's #UNGA week! Remember to allow extra time if you're going anywhere near UNHQ on the East Side of NYC. http://t.co/em2Zi4Jjhw
Continues this week in Geneva: Committee on the Rights of the Child http://t.co/CmatKp5MQm #CRC
Now that the #UNGA is underway, see what role it plays in @UNPeacekeeping here: http://t.co/YxCWGr67FG #globalcontribution
Continues this week in Windhoek: policy forum on drylands, desertification & drought http://t.co/ez3R6jajrk. Follow #COP11 & @UNCCD

Starts today in NYC but you can follow along online: @SocialGood Summit celebrating tech & #socialgood: http://t.co/GQ0k4mScLc #2030NOW
World leaders are arriving in NYC for this week's #UNGA high-level meetings, the general debate & more. http://t.co/FfBMRtx33A

Is there a #SocialGoodSummit meetup in your country? 120+ countries have events. Find out: http://t.co/1Z6NCzjoHA #2030NOW
After 20 years, UN Commission on Sustainable Development held its final session this week. Find out why here: http://t.co/rm7OPmzR3Y
Released Saturday at @UNBBCom: latest figures on global #broadband development http://t.co/R8S7ThSZRg

Education needs to be effective & equitable to ensure that it is a driver of peace rather than war. http://t.co/l4NVDoUIDb #PeaceDay
